ComicInfo.Summary: Hey, Detective O'Mega...: Detective O'Mega wants to solve the mystery of a dead prostitute dressed like Zephyr. Meanwhile, Rusty and Cosmic Rae are recruited for a secret government mission alongside other heroes and Doc visits an old enemy in prison.
